title: LSF Moderation AMA
body:
Hello and welcome, to the first public evisceration of LSF moderation in 2025. We offer ourselves up as sacrifice to the ravenous hordes of angered Hasan fans, ambivalent Asmongold viewers, and saddened Destiny stans, and hope that this sates your thirst for our blood until the next time.

We’re hoping to answer genuine questions and concerns, but please try to keep it civil. The meta rule isn’t being enforced here so that we can take feedback and questions, but all other rules are still on the table, so if you want to call me a loser cuck scumbag, do it in my DMs so I can save it to my collection.

If your question is about a moderation decision or something specific, **please provide a link or screenshots to a specific example** of what you’re talking about, so that we don’t spend a bunch of messages going back and forth trying to figure out exactly what you’re talking about.

Let the trolling commence.

>Thanks for joining us, we're done for the night here, but if people want us to do stuff like this again sometime, let us know. 
>
>If anyone has any other questions or feedback for us on things you'd like to see in the future, you can reach me via DMs, or find me in our Discord server.

title: Join the LSF discord
body: Need more terrible takes, streamer drama, or just want to say fuck you to your least favorite LSF mod? Join our discord!
